attributes.action: Stop motorcycle and scooter theft in London, we need to work safely.
attributes.background: I work as courier and everyday I see young mans theft scooter and motorcycle in London. We need a help please.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. Policing in London is the responsibility of the Metropolitan Police Service, which is the responsibility of the London Mayor's Office for Policing and Crime (MOPAC). MOPAC is overseen by the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/mayor-assembly/london-assembly/take-part/petitions
